results.title: The Question of causation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 11 of Series “Against all odds: inside statistics”.
Studies the idea that causation is only one of many possible explanations for strong statistical correlations. Others may be common responses to a third factor, a confounding factor or coincidence. We are shown the importance of lurking variables, and Simpson’s paradox. As an example of the way in which evidence for causation is gathered when experiments cannot be done, the video presents an historical documentary on smoking and lung cancer. Presented by Theresa M. Amabile.

results.title: Correlation
results.creator_credit: Jill Singer, American Statistical Association, Chedd-Angier Productions and COMAP
results.brief_description:
Episode number 9 of Series “Against all odds: inside statistics”.
This program looks at the strength and direction of the relationship between two variables, by interpreting correlations, deriving the correlation co-efficient, and correlation and regression. Examples used are the relationship between twins’ personality and whether they were raised together or apart, and the relationship between baseball home runs and players’ salaries.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jill Singer, American Statistical Association, Chedd-Angier Productions and COMAP

results.title: The Colonel
results.creator_credit: Jenifer Hooks, Rolf De Heer and AFTRS
results.brief_description: An army colonel, having outlived his usefulness to the revolution, is imprisoned. Refusing to sign a false confession, he is eventually forced into a position of choice - his principles or his life.

results.title: Guru
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Pascal Guilloux and Safina Uberoi
results.brief_description: In the West, people fall in love and then get married. In India, people get married and then fall in love. But this is not India - this is Parramatta, in Sydney, Australia…A film celebrating cultural clashes amidst a wild and wonderful festival of colour. Original format 16 mm.

results.title: The Space between the door and the floor
results.creator_credit: Andrew O'Sullivan, Pauline Chan and AFTRS
results.brief_description: He sits alone in his office waiting for the girl of his dreams. When she comes, he will see her approach in the space between the bottom of the door and the floor. He lights a cigarette and waits … In the space between the door and the floor there lies a sliver of light in a dark world of fantasy and desire.

results.title: Redfern Beach
results.creator_credit: Rachel Roberts, Catriona McKenzie and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
Max needs to choose between money and love. An old bagman gives Max a magic fishing lure. As colour begins to seep into his life, the choice becomes clear.
Cast features Michael Tuahine, Phaedra Nicolaidis, Nicholas Papademetriou and Tony Barry.

results.title: The Laundry
results.creator_credit: Lesley Dyer, Alex Chomicz and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
A big man covered in blood enters a basement laundry. Is the threat in her mind or it real? And which is more scary…?
Cast features Rhonnda Findleton and Domenic Galati.
